StreamGobbler.RedirectStreamGobbler RedirectStreamGobbler allows you to redirect the input stream to an outputstream, as well as supporting a stringbuffer.

StreamGobbler.StringBuilderStreamGobbler This is the simplest, fastest stream gobbler.
